required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Phase II Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of TQB2450 Injection in Relapsed or Refractory Classical Hodgkin's Lymphoma
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of TQB2450 Injection in Relapsed or Refractory Classical Hodgkin's Lymphoma

lead_sponsor.agency: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Chia Tai Tianqing Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: Single-Arm, Open-Label, Multicenter Clinical Trial. To observe the efficacy and safety of TQB2450 in patients of non-hodgkin lymphoma

primary_outcome.description: Overall Response Rate (ORR) defined as the proportion of subjects who achieves a best response of CR or PR, assessed by IRC per the Lugano Classification

secondary_outcome.description: Disappearance of all non-target lesions and normalisation of tumour marker level. All lymph nodes must be non-pathological in size (<10mm short axis).

intervention.description: TQB2450 is injectived (IV) every-3-weeks (Q3W) and it should be continued until disease progression or intolerable toxicity or patients withdrawal of consent, the longest use time of experimental drugs is 96 weeks.

facility.name: No.17, panjiayuan nanli, chaoyang district, Beijing
